text: Carmelo Morales Erostarbe (4 December 1930 - 28 April 2003) was a Spanish professional racing cyclist. He rode in seven editions of the Tour de France. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1930 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Spanish male cyclists Category:People from Enkarterri Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
title: Carmelo Morales Erostarbe
